overview: Mexican Corruption gives us four slices of Mexican life, including a mafia gangbang, a sex slavery ring, a dirty cop, and a soldier with a fondness for watersports. Fresh from a drug score, two studs are stopped by a local cop who forces his big night stick down both men’s eager throats until they share his load. Cruising a hookup website, a cute boy is told a wild story by a spoiled rich kid who claims to have been abducted and gangfucked by the Mexican Mafia in an all-too-common ransom scheme. A city slicker cons a local Indian kid into leaving his country life behind and coming to Mexico City. A cute hustler stops to take a piss in an alley and gets busted by a soldier who has needs of his own.
tagline: We travel to the beautiful country of Mexico to discover its hot and corrupt inhabitants
title: Mexican Corruption
